short_description: crown catering ltd. is a hotel based in cirencester, united kingdom.
long_description:
since our inception in 2005 we have built an outstanding reputation as one of south west's leading wedding, corporate and event caterers. founded from the hq in cirencester, in the heart of the cotswolds, crown catering uses finest quality ingredients and fantastic ideas to create the winning combination we have today. our company has doubled year on year during the recession. we owe this success to our flexible approach; adapting to our customers needs while providing a quality customer experience. at crown catering we recognise the importance of the environment and the effect of carbon emissions. our aims are wherever possible to:• use locally produced seasonal products• reduce the amount of waste produced and where possible reuse and recycle• minimise transportation• energy and water consumption management• create awareness to all our employees on our carbon footprint
if you would like to call and speak with one of our food & beverage or event managers please give us a call and arrange a time to come in for a chat and a coffee.
business_tags: food and beverage | hospitality | leisure & tourism | catering events | event management
generated_description: crown catering is a leading wedding, corporate, and event caterer in the south west region of the united kingdom. established in 2005, the company is headquartered in cirencester, located in the cotswolds. with a focus on using high-quality ingredients and innovative ideas, crown catering has gained a strong reputation in the industry. despite the challenges posed by the recession, the business has experienced year-on-year growth by adapting to customer needs and providing a quality customer experience. the company is committed to environmental sustainability and aims to minimize waste, minimize transportation, and manage energy and water consumption. crown caterage also strives to create awareness among its employees about its carbon footprint. for inquiries from food & beverage or event managers, customers can contact the company to arrange a meeting and discuss their needs.
